data.actual_result: brings you to the home screen
data.expected_result: it Should bring you back to the GDM
data.short_description: If opening discord through the "game detection service" notification, pressing the back button when on an incoming GDM call will bring you to the home screen
data.steps_to_repro: - close discord entirely and clear it from recent apps - look at your notifications - select the "game detection service" notification - go to a GDM with a call already ongoing - join the call - press the back button
